mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of Virginia / by Jed. Hotchkiss, Top. Eng., Staunton, Va., 1874 ; Department of Agriculture, G.W. Koiner, commissioner ; lith. by A. Hoen & Co., Richmond, Va
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: A. Hoen & Co.
Hotchkiss, Jedediah, 1828-1899
Koiner, George W. (George Wellington), 1852-1939
Virginia. Department of Agriculture
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Shows the natural divisions in color: Tidewater, Middle, Piedmont, Blue Ridge, Valley, Appalacia.
Includes inset of untitled regional location map.
Copyright 1875 by Jed. Hotchkiss in lower left corner.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Hotchkiss B; not listed in Swem, E.G. Maps relating to Virginia. Copy 1 mounted on linen; copy 2 has front cover labelled Virginia attached to its verso.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Physical geography--Virginia--Maps
Virginia--Maps, Physical
